player_news.trend_summary: Mehdi Taremi's two goals against Uzbekistan secured Iran's qualification for the 2026 World Cup, making them one of the first teams to reach the tournament. The Inter Milan striker's heroics have sparked discussion about potential travel bans impacting the team's participation.
